cleaning up the poms: - removed tiles-eval (now out of scope) - updated the poms to use tiles-master-4-SNAPSHOT    (including reference to snapshot repository) - Regrouped the reporting plugins into tiles-master    and updated them with current versions - Moved issue management from tiles master into the projects - Fixed missing licence headers in the poms
changed the URLs of autotag and request to match JIRA
site documentation for tiles-request

merged the autotag-runtime projects into the matching request implementations, as discussed here: http://mail-archives.apache.org/mod_mbox/tiles-dev/201110.mbox/%3CCAHTRnew8sEF+GrT_4PC7_OQcoaJo8zpo592bJSgTTdCo3edE0Q@mail.gmail.com%3E
documentation for autotag
moved ComposeStackUtil out of autotag because it is tiles-specific
removed misleading @since in tiles-request and tiles-autotag, since the project restarts at version 1.0
fixes: - replaced deprecated pom.version with project.version everywhere - fixed some syntax errors in the docs - fixed the missing tld docs
Add missing OSGI manifests and use dependencyManagement to achieve convergence
add missing licence headers or autogenerated notices where needed
Moved tiles-request and tiles-autotag into their own versionning structures
updated the poms with the new SCM URLs
